— About —

Denee Motion | Dubai Wedding Videography & Photography Dubai Wedding Videography & Photography

Denee Motion Boutique Wedding Films & Stills is a team of highly experienced creative wedding filmmakers & photographers based out of London and Dubai. We take our wedding assignments seriously by looking after every tiny detail giving our films and photos that extra human touch. We travel worldwide for various projects, but chose Dubai and the region as our number one location to film and photograph weddings and various events throughout the year.
